lesson-1.title: الحروف الأبجدية وتراكيب الحروف
lesson-1.explain:
Ch -->
النطق : تشا
مثل : chair
sh -->
النطق : شا
مثل : ship | sheep
th -->
النطق : ثـ أو ذ
مثل : three | the

lesson-2.title: دمج الحروف و تكوين السؤال
lesson-2.explain:
this : هذا/ هذه
that : ذلك / تلك
is : يكون / تكون
تكوين السؤال :
this is a table => is this a table
that is a woman => is that a woman الشرح :

لتكوين السؤال نقوم بوضع كلمة "is" في لبداية

lesson-3.title: تعلم النفي
lesson-3.explain:
لنفي جملة :
this is a laptop => this is not a laptop
that is a phone => that is not a phone الشرح :

لنفي جملة نضيف كلمة " not " بعد كلمة "is" في الجملة

lesson-4.title: A & AN  المفرد
lesson-4.explain:
أدوات المفرد :
A | AN

توضع قبل الإسم للدلالة على أنه مفرد


An : توضع قبل الاسم المفرد المبدوء بصوت "a"
A : توضع قبل كل الأسماء المفردة عدا المبدوءة بصوت "a"
أمثلة :
a laptop | an apple
a phone |an orange

lesson-1.title: التحدث عن الملكية"have"
lesson-1.explain:
الضمائر
  • أنا : I
  • أنت : you
  • نحن : we
  • هم : they
have : لديك - لدي - لدينا - لديهم
الشرح :
نستخدم "have" مع الضمائر المذكورة مسبقا والأسماء الجمع

lesson-2.title: التحدث عن الملكية "has"
lesson-2.explain:
الضمائر
  • هو : he
  • هي : she
  • هو/هي لغير العاقل : it
has : لديه لديها
الشرح :
نستخدم "has" مع الضمائر المذكورة مسبقا والأسماء المفرد

lesson-3.title: التعبير عن أماكن الأشياء
lesson-3.explain:
التعبير عن الأماكن

on : على
in : في
أمثلة :
the handbag is on the table
the rin is in the cabinet

lesson-1.title: تعلم كلمات جديدة من خلال نص
lesson-1.explain:
النص الأول

this is my friend Jane , she works in a hospital ,she helps sick people ,she loves her job very much ,Jane is very helpful that man is my uncle Fred ,uncle Fred is funny ,he works in the circus ,he makes people laugh ,uncle Fred is a clown ,he is not angry but doesn't like angry people

النص الثاني

These are my grandparents they are workers they ,they make leather bags ,they are not lazy ,but they don’t like their job ,they want to quit those women are my aunts ,they are housewives , they like to cook and study with their children ,they are very patient , I love y aunts

lesson-2.title: محادثات ومواقف 1
lesson-2.explain:
المحادثة الأولى

Teacher : do you understand ?

Students : yes , we do

teacher : great , do you want to continue

no , we don’t

الشرح :

في البداية "do" لتكوين سؤال نضع

المحادثة الثانية

Marc and Tom are here

do you have a ticket

yes , I do , do you know which mall

no I don’t

المحادثة الثالثة

Marc and Tom are here

do they love basketball ?

yes , they do

--

do they love basketball ?

No , they don’t

المحادثة الرابعة

excuse me

do we know you

no , you don’t , do you need coffee

yes , we do

lesson-3.title: محادثات ومواقف  2
lesson-3.explain:
المحادثة الأولى

Does he go to the sports club ?

Yes , he does

does he play soccer

no , he doesn’t

المحادثة الثانية

Does she love cooking

yes , she does

does she want to become a cook

no , she doesn’t

المحادثة الثالثة

Does marc sing

yes , he does

does he play music , too

no he doesn’t

المحادثة الثالثة

Does the actor cry in the play

yes , he does

does your friend enjoy the play

yes , he does

lesson-4.title: محادثات ومواقف 3
lesson-4.explain:
المحادثة الأولى

There is a good movie in the cinema does she want to join ?

no , I think she can’t , she has a lot of work

okay , does she have time tomorrow

no he doesn’t

Well , do you want to come to the cinema tonight

yes , I think I can join , thanks for the invitation

المحادثة الثانية

Does she like cake ?

no , she doesn’t like cake

why

because she doesn’t like sweet things

I understand , but do you want some cake ?

yes , sure

الشرح :
  • اسألني : ask me
  • اسألها : ask her
  • اسأله : ask him

lesson-5.title: تعلم كلمات جديدة من خلال نص
lesson-5.explain:
النص

Everyday I wake up at 9 , I drink a lot of water ,and eat my breakfast then I start to exercise I return to the house tired , but my mother asks me to do many things , I tell her I need to rest first In the evening I call my friend and invite him to go to the cinema with me , we go to the cinema and enjoy the movies , then we return to our houses happy , we like the cinema so much

الشرح
  • العديد من : many
  • الكثير من : much
  • الوفرة من : a lot of

lesson-6.title: تعلم السؤال ب there
lesson-6.explain:
المحادثة الأولى

Do you like your geography lessons ?

yes , I do

Great , are there maps in your classroom

yes , there are different maps

do you like other subjects

yes , I like history too

الشرح :

في البداية "are"نضع"there"لتكوين سؤال بـ

المحادثة الثانية

Are there history books in your classroom ?

no there aren’t history books in the classroom , there are history books in the library

is there a smart board in your classroom

yes , there is a smart board in our classroom

are there many students ?

No ,there aren’t many students

lesson-7.title: التعبير عن الماضي 1
lesson-7.explain:
النص

Yesterday my friend and I played games on the computer together after we finished , we started painting then we watched the television last week , we visited our a beautiful museum in the city we took pictures of many status and enjoyed the old scene we return to our houses and cooked delicious food

الشرح

لتحويل فعل الى الماضي نضيف "ed" الى آخره

إذا كان ينتهي بـ"e" نكتفي بإضافة "d"

ميثالplay => played

lesson-8.title: التعبير عن الماضي 2
lesson-8.explain:
النص

Last week we went on trip to the zoo , We saw different kinds of animals , we took a lot of pictures , We were so happy we enjoyed the scene , The weather was nice , too We had some rest then we ate a lot of fruit and drank a lot of water

الشرح

"we they you "تضاف قبل الضمائر"were" وكل اسم جمع لتعني كان(و)

lesson-9.title: تعلم النفي في الماضي
lesson-9.explain:
النفي

لكي تنفي في الماضي تضيف "didn't" قبل الفعل مباشرة وتضع الفعل في شكله الأساسي

ميثال

I didn’t go to school yesterday

lesson-10.title: التدرب على الماضي
lesson-10.explain:
النص

Last summer my friends and I went to Hurghada , on the first day ,we went to a very good restaurant , it had a wonderful view of the sea ,we loved the seen ,the dishes were very delicious
On the next day we spent the whole day at the beach ,we swam and had a great time , it was a short holiday but it was very entertaining and relaxing at the same time , we went back to our houses very excited

تدريب
went to

On the first day theya restaurant

dishes

the were very delicious

second

on the day

bought

they souvenirs and gifts

lesson-11.title: السؤال على الماضي
lesson-11.explain:
المحادثة الأولى

Did your friend travel to Austria ?

Yes , he did

did he enjoy the trip ?

Yes , he enjoyed the trip a lot

الشرح

لتحويل جملة عادية الى سؤال في الماضي نضع في البداية "did"

ميثال

did your friend travel to Austria?

المحادثة الثانية

Did you buy new clothes?

Yes, I bought very wonderful clothes

did you spend all the money

yes , I did

المحادثة الثاالثة

Did your family like the new restaurant

yes , they did

did they try all the dishes

no , they didn’t

المحادثة الرابعة

Did the children go to the beach yesterday ?

yes , they did

did they love it ?

Yes, they like it a lot they swam and played with the sand

المحادثة الأخيرة

did the man climb the mountain ?Yes, The man climbed the mountain

- did the student understand the lesson ? No , the student didn’t understand the lesso

did the boy eat the cake ?Yes, the boy ate the cake

- did the man drink his coffee No , the man didn’t drink his coffee

did the girl go to the garden ? Yes , the girl went to the garden

lesson-12.title: تدرب على الوحدة وكلمات جديدة
lesson-12.explain:
النص

Hi , my name is Jane ,last week a bought a new flat ,the flat is big and lovely , it’s in a lovely area , too it has three room but it doesn’t have a balcony ,I finally found this flat , I am glad and excited , I searched a lot but I didn’t find a flat like this

There are two big windows in the flat , there is a fridge a television , a bookcase there are many good things in this flat my friend Sara helped me to decorate it, I filled it with many flowers and plants , I put deferent kinds of light ,too I love my flat

lesson-1.title: محادثة تفاعلية
lesson-1.explain:
المحادثة

Hi ,is this a new shirt ?

Yes this is a new shirt

it looks good ,did you buy it yesterday

yes I did do you like it

yes , I do , it looks beautiful

I have another one for you

really , wow , thank you but why

it is a present

no , it’s a souvenir from your trip , right

Do you know about my trip Did jack tell you

No , jack didn’t tell me anything ,Sarah told me

Sarah talks much

yes she does , I wanted to come with you

Oh sorry next time we can go together

all right , no problem , you should tell me next time

sure I am sorry again

don’t worry about it , I’m a big boy ,I am not sad

Thank you I should go now I do not want to be late for work

oh yes please go see you next time

bye bye

lesson-2.title: محادثات تفاعلية
lesson-2.explain:
المحادثة

Are there your books ?

Yes these are my books

great , do you love reading ?

yes I love reading so much reading is my hobby

Really , that’s great , reading is so important ,I think I can find you in the bookstore all the time , right ?

Yeah you can find me in the library at school too I love it

So interesting , do you have other hobbies , too

Yes many I love playing music learning languages and painting

nice can I see your paintings ?

yes sure but I think I do not have them now with me

Okay , don’t worry maybe next time

Sure

yeah , but did you know there is a new book for Paulo Coelho , did you buy it

no I did not but thank you I should buy it

Great , it was nice meeting and talking to you ,dear

thanks a lot

lesson-3.title: محادثات تفاعلية
lesson-3.explain:
المحادثة

Excuse me , is there a restaurant in this area ?

I think there is but I am not sure

well I should search

we can ask together I am hungry too can I join

nice , so we can eat and talk

Yes sure

you don’t look American , I think you are Italian right

yes my father is from Italy but my mother is from America

Well I’m from France but my family lives here

Interesting

do you have a job?

yes I am an engineer I work in an office around this area and you

That’s nice , I’m an artist I invite you to my new play

no I did not but thank you I should buy it

thanks a lot

Oh that is nice I like plays

Oh ,finally I very hungry

I think this is the restaurant you want
